Uses of Class
org.apache.beam.sdk.util.CloudObject

  • Packages that use CloudObject 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.runners.spark.coders
    Beam coders and coder-related utilities for running on Apache Spark.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders
    Defines Coders to specify how data is encoded to and decoded from byte strings.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.protobuf
    Defines a Coder for Protocol Buffers messages, ProtoCoder.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hdfs
    Transforms used to read from the Hadoop file system (HDFS).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.join
    Defines the CoGroupByKey transform for joining multiple PCollections.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing
    Defines the Window transform for dividing the elements in a PCollection into windows, and the Trigger for controlling when those elements are output.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util
    Defines utilities that can be used by Beam runners.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.values
    Defines PCollection and other classes for representing data in a Pipeline.

    • Uses of CloudObject in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders

      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders that return CloudObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloudObject StandardCoder.asCloudObject()
      Adds the following properties to the CloudObject representation: component_encodings: A list of coders represented as CloudObjects equivalent to the Coder.getCoderArguments(). encoding_id: An identifier for the binary format written by Coder.encode(T, java.io.OutputStream, org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder.Context).
      CloudObject Coder.asCloudObject()
      Returns the CloudObject that represents this Coder.
      CloudObject CustomCoder.initializeCloudObject()
      Subclasses should override this method to customize the CloudObject representation.
      protected CloudObject AvroCoder.initializeCloudObject() 
      CloudObject SerializableCoder.initializeCloudObject() 
      protected CloudObject StandardCoder.initializeCloudObject()
      Subclasses should override this method to customize the CloudObject representation.
      protected CloudObject IterableCoder.initializeCloudObject() 
      protected CloudObject JAXBCoder.initializeCloudObject() 
      protected CloudObject LengthPrefixCoder.initializeCloudObject() 
      protected CloudObject KvCoder.initializeCloudObject()

    • Uses of CloudObject in org.apache.beam.sdk.util

      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.util that return CloudObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloudObject CloudObject.clone() 
      static CloudObject SerializableUtils.ensureSerializable(Coder<?> coder)
      Serializes a Coder and verifies that it can be correctly deserialized.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forBoolean(Boolean value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forClass(Class<?> cls)
      Constructs a CloudObject to be used for serializing an instance of the supplied class for transport via the Dataflow API.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forClassName(String className)
      Constructs a CloudObject to be used for serializing data to be deserialized using the supplied class name the supplied class name for transport via the Dataflow API.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forFloat(Double value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forFloat(Float value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forInteger(Integer value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forInteger(Long value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forKnownType(Object value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value of a well-known cloud object type.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.forString(String value)
      Constructs a CloudObject representing the given value.
      static CloudObject CloudObject.fromSpec(Map<String,Object> spec)
      Constructs a CloudObject by copying the supplied serialized object spec, which must represent an SDK object serialized for transport via the Dataflow API.
      CloudObject WindowedValue.FullWindowedValueCoder.initializeCloudObject() 
      CloudObject WindowedValue.ValueOnlyWindowedValueCoder.initializeCloudObject()
